headline: U.S. Defense Stocks Falls After Trump Hints at Breakthrough in Ukraine--Russia Talks

headline: Curtiss-Wright Boosts Share Buyback Authorization to $550 Million
summary: CW lifts its buyback authorization to $550 million, setting up record 2025 repurchases as strong cash flow fuels its shareholder-return strategy.

raw.headline: Curtiss-Wright Boosts Share Buyback Authorization to $550 Million
raw.summary: CW lifts its buyback authorization to $550 million, setting up record 2025 repurchases as strong cash flow fuels its shareholder-return strategy.

headline: US robotics maker urges manufacturing reforms, citing cost concerns
summary: If no action is taken, Standard Bots CEO Evan Beard said at a recent congressional hearing that inexpensive robots from China will flood the US market as automation demand swells.

raw.headline: US robotics maker urges manufacturing reforms, citing cost concerns
raw.summary: If no action is taken, Standard Bots CEO Evan Beard said at a recent congressional hearing that inexpensive robots from China will flood the US market as automation demand swells.
